meanings.definition: To trust or rely on someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She was lippening on her best friend to keep her secret.
meanings.sent2: I always lippen on my alarm clock to wake me up in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat was lippening on the mouse to come out of its hole.
meanings.sent4: The hiker was lippening on his compass to guide him through the dense forest.
meanings.sent5: The child lippened on his mother's hand to safely cross the street.

meanings.definition: The act of expecting or anticipating something.
meanings.sent1: His lippening for the weekend began on Monday.
meanings.sent2: The students were full of lippening for the upcoming school trip.
meanings.sent3: The dog's lippening for treats was evident in its wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The audience's lippening for the magician's next trick filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The child's lippening for Santa Claus on Christmas Eve was palpable.
